falstad

Class MazeFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • falstad.MazeFileReader

  • public class MazeFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides functionality to read the content of a Maze object from a file. File format is XML and produced with MazeFileWriter. The class is a simple wrapper to make all fields of a Maze object accessible such that with the help of this class it is straightforward to instantiate a Maze object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MazeFileReader(java.lang.String filename)
      Constructor reads maze data from given file.
